doc:
Mary Barclay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Barclay 0 Mary Barclay (20 July 1916 – 19 February 2008) was an English film, television and theatre actress. She was best known for playing Stella Dane in the Crossroads television series, as well as her role in the 1973 film, A Touch of Class. Mary_Barclay ( 20_July_1916 – 19_February_2008 ) was an_English_film_,_television_and_theatre_actress . She was_best_known for playing_Stella_Dane in the_Crossroads_television_series , as_well_as her_role in the_1973_film , A_Touch of Class .
